loonR 0.1.751

Build lasso or ridge regression

Source: R/Biomarker.R
build.lassoOrRidge.regression.Rd

Build lasso or ridge regression

build.lassoOrRidge.regression(
  df,
  group,
  seed = 666,
  scale = TRUE,
  alpha = 1,
  lambda = NA,
  nfolds = 10,
  type.measure = "auc"
)

Arguments

seed

Default 666
scale

Default TRUE
alpha

1 for lasso, 0 for ridge
lambda
nfolds

Default 10, number of folds
type.measure

Default auc. Refer https://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/glmnet/versions/4.1-3/topics/cv.glmnet

Value

Examples

data("LIRI")
reg.res <- loonR::build.lassoOrRidge.regression(LIRI[,3:5],LIRI$status)
#> Pls note: Second unique variable is defined as experiment group
#> [1] "Perform lasso"

#> Setting levels: control = 0, case = 1
#> Setting direction: controls > cases
#> Setting levels: control = 0, case = 1
#> Setting direction: controls > cases
